title: Shaker
description: ShakerI didn’t do relationships. Because I had been burned. I didn’t do repeats. Because I was burned, again. I slipped and allowed a repeat. And I was burned for a third time. Then I found her. Beaten and bruised. I knew only I could protect her. And I wanted to. As a friend. I wouldn’t fall in love with her. I couldn’t fall in love with her. But I did. And it almost killed her.Shaker is Book Five in the Blackwings MC Series.Adult Content For ages 18 years and older due to explicit language, sexual content, and violence.
author: Teagan Brooks
